Description:
IntroductionYour Role and ResponsibilitiesWho We AreIBM Z is the worldâ€™s most powerful business platform. 68% of enterprise production workloads, 80% of structured enterprise data, and 55% of all enterprise transactions, including more than 50% of the back-end transactions generated from mobile enterprise applications run on IBM Z. Before this backdrop, our team is embarking on an exciting journey to usher in the era of AIOps in zSystems Software.
The Position
The IBM Z AIOps team is seeking an experienced zSystems Software Developer to provide technical implementation and leadership as we develop an advanced approach to IT operations. As a backend developer, you will be part of a highly focused, self-managed team that designs, develops and tests cognitive insights created from Z Systems workloads and applications. The Z AIOps solutions collect availability and performance log and metric data from the z/OS operating systems and subsystems, then stream the data to endpoints for analysis, where anomalies from normal operations are identified and alerts are generated.
You will take technical ownership of new features and capabilities for our solution and provide architectural, design and implementation leadership for these features. In this capacity, you will work closely with the solution architecture and UX Design teams, and you will guide junior software engineers in the agile implementation of high-quality deliverables. You will drive the integration of the features assigned to you into our automated Continuous Deployment pipeline, and you will be responsible for reviewing the business value they deliver with Product Management. You will share your z/OS and subsystem expertise with the Z AIOps organization to aid in the development of advanced Z AIOps insights.

Who You AreEnjoy the challenge of finding and resolving complex technical issues.
Are curious by nature: creative by default: passionate about the promise of technology.
Value teamwork while leading by example.
Remember to always bring empathy to the client, team, design, or task.
Have an interest in and understanding of modern software architectural patterns.
Have an interest in, understanding of, or experience with Design Thinking.
Bring strong verbal and written communication skills as well as technical skills.Required Technical and Professional Expertise8+ years of professional experience working as a software developer.
Good experience in C & Assembler.
Experience in all phases of software development including architecture, design, coding, unit testing and functional testing.
Mainframe Domain knowledge: z/OS plus some levels of subsystem experience such as Db2, CICS, MQ and/or IMS.
Experience working with mainframe development and debugging tools.
Experience in the implementation of microservices-based architectures.
Experience in Agile software development methodologies.
Experience working in Linux environments.Preferred Technical and Professional ExpertiseExperience with Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift.
Experience working in z/OS environments.
Experience with Python development.
Knowledge of streaming technologies such as Kafka.Job Details
